subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay pulverized a Mariano Rivera fastball for a game-tying home run in the ninth and an 11th inning homer by Kevin Youkilis won the game for the Red Sox.
snippet: Jason Bay pulverized a Mariano Rivera fastball for a game-tying home run in the ninth and an 11th inning homer by Kevin Youkilis won the game for the Red Sox.
